topics.body:
And now a public service announcement, brought to you by Nightvale Community Radio.

What to do if you find yourself caught in a geographical loop, that is to say constantly returning to the same location, such as an open field beneath a moonless black night in which three faceless specters beckon for you to join them.

What you do is immediately stop running and screaming. This never helps anything. Instead, calmly and keeping the center of the loop, the faceless black specters, abandoned cemetery or ominous looming mountain in your peripheral vision and moving in a spiral pattern, distance yourself from the center of the geographical loop.

Nice try, monstrous brown stone spire that whispers in my dreams! You're not getting me today!

[spoiler]Listen to Welcome To Nightvale, it is the greatest podcast ever made.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
